title: South Meadow WS cumulative rainfall reset
description: South Meadow Weather Station has cumulative rainfall calculated on the datalogger, in inches.  It does not reset at the new water year (Oct. 1).    I reset it manually today to the level it should be if it had been accumulating properly since Oct 1.    All values from Oct 1 until Dec 30 need 57.76 inches subtracted to get accurate values.  This then needs to be converted to metric for the other two datastreams.  incident report migrated from SensorDB.
